Articles.Content:
Hello everyone

So I finished collecting mods for my 1.1 game and started playing. While installing mods, I was testing them in sanbox mode and had decent fps. But when I created a career game and started it, I saw a terrible picture of 10 fps at space center.

There are mods I currently have (I don't know about other ways to export them automaticly in readable format, lol)

Spoiler

+ Waypoint Manager

Community Tech Tree

Station Science

So where can be the problem?

 

Edit: Searched through the forum more closely, I found source of the problem. It was Contract Configurator.

Edited April 26, 2016 by Alfaksan
